knimeNode.name: AddDistanceEdges
knimeNode.shortDescription: Adds edges with distances to the given tracking network.

fullDescription.intro: Adds edges to a tracking network containing the distance of nodes in subsequent partitions according to a distance function.
fullDescription.option: The distance function which is calculated between each candidate pair of nodes
Edges above this distance are not created. Improves performance of other tracking nodes

ports.inPort: The tracking network containing no edges so far
ports.outPort: The tracking network with added edges containing the distance
